title: "Predicting Acute Kidney Injury in Hospitalized SCD Patients Using Machine Learning"
excerpt: "The following is a summary of “Machine Learning Predicts Acute Kidney Injury in Hospitalized Patients with Sickle Cell Disease,” published in the October 2023 issue of Nephrology by Zahr et al. Acute Kidney Injury (AKI) is common in hospitalized sickle cell disease (SCD) patients and can lead to poor outcomes."
